com.enterprise_architecture.essential.report.security
Class EipSSOCookie

java.lang.Object
  com.enterprise_architecture.essential.report.security.EipSSOCookie

public class EipSSOCookie
extends java.lang.Object

Class to manage the cookie that is used by the Secure Essential Viewer Engine to find a user session from the EIP data management application.

Author:
Jonathan W. Carter

Set the requested account token in the cookie

Parameters:
theRequest - the request from the user
theResponse - the response to the user, in which the cookie will be saved
theAccoutID - the ID of the user account.

Find the user's account ID from the account token cookie

Parameters:
theRequest - the user request containing the account token cookie
Returns:
the user account ID from the token.

buildCookieDomain

protected java.lang.String buildCookieDomain(java.lang.String theDomain)
Build the correct Cookie domain specifier from the supplied domain. Handles localhost / specific host plus SAAS deployment

Parameters:
theDomain - the supplied server domain of the web application
Returns:
a corrected Cookie domain for the Cookie.setDomain() operation.
